summary:
Journey with a new companion named Grudge
An Ogre lol i mean an ORC in whiterun? thats right hes cool calm and collected.
descriptionHtml:
GRUDGE
TESV Vanilia friendly
Cool and calm Orc Male Follower, He will watch your back and cant die...
Wields an Enchanted Greatsword and more.
Has a few spells but he needs help to get stronger.
He can cast healing spells.

New- Character will lvl with you up to lvl 100.
His speed is 125 to keep up with you.
Can be married.

This is the second companion that i have made and i just want for others that like this follower to enjoy him, For new players to Skyrim i think hes a great companion to get the player to know about the Orc race aswell he will mark your map.
This is a FINAL version of this companion, I have tested him out allot also no issues with his texures that i know of.

He is found in the (bannered mare) upstairs past the kitchen.


Recomended Mods for male characters and followers as listed,
High Res Face Maps for Men by Geonox by Geonox http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4141
More Muscular Men texture normals by tigersan-wolverinehowlett http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4145


To Install this mod drop the data folder into the skyrim folder, If you have any questions please let me know.

To Uninstall this companion mod use NMM or take out the .esp files for him though remember to take any item(s) from him before doing so.
author: breakitup
